backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing photo metadata and blob references with functions to add, list, and retrieve photos.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI theme updates and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, styles, and utilities for the photo gallery app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app with updated title and description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing the landing layout, upload form, gallery, and photo viewer dialog.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with sunset-themed background, accented text, and buttons scrolling to upload or gallery.
frontend/src/components/landing/Highligh: Section showing three feature highlight cards with icons and autumn-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Sticky header with branding and navigation buttons that scroll to upload and gallery sections.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoGall: Photo gallery component handling loading, errors, empty state, and displaying clickable photo tiles.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoUplo: UI component for selecting, previewing, and uploading photos with drag-and-drop, progress tracking, and error/success handling.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoView: Displays a modal dialog showing a selected photo with its metadata such as upload date and content type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, persisting and loading identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotos.ts: React Query hooks for listing and uploading photos, including file validation, byte conversion, and backend upload logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for a warm light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the application.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and using several Tailwind plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, features, issues, and image requirements for a photo gallery website, including design notes and known build problems. Serves as a configuration and tracking document for features and visual direction.
